fields.Name: Stalker's Blade
fields.Description: +30 Bonus Gold per Large Monster Kill Passive - Chilling Smite: Smite can be cast on enemy champions, dealing reduced true damage and stealing 20% movement speed for 2 seconds. Passive - Jungler: Deal 45 additional magic damage to monsters over 2 seconds and gain 10 Health Regen and 5 Mana Regen per second while under attack from neutral monsters. Limited to 1 Jungle item
